    <article about="/homepage" class="node node-template-homepage node-promoted clearfix" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
     <span class="rdf-meta element-hidden" content="Law Firm Search &amp; Top Law Firms On Call" property="dc:title">
     </span>
     <span class="rdf-meta element-hidden" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" property="sioc:num_replies">
     </span>
     <div class="content">
      <div class="paragraphs-items paragraphs-items-field-module-hero paragraphs-items-field-module-hero-full paragraphs-items-full">
       <div class="field field-name-field-module-hero field-type-paragraphs field-label-hidden">
        <div class="field-items">
         <div class="field-item even">
          <div class="ls-m-hero nav-padding ">
           <div class="module-container">
            <div class="hero-wrapper">
             <div class="svg-container">
              <img alt="Hero Background" src="https://www.legalshield.com/sites/default/files/LS_Home_Large_D_V03.png"/>
             </div>
             <div class="container-fluid">
              <div class="row">
               <div class="col-xs-12">
                <div class="header-wrapper">
                 <p class="ls-c-title is-extra-small subtitle">
                  WHY LEGALSHIELD
                 </p>
                 <h1 class="ls-c-title is-large">
                  Were making smart legal coverage simple
                 </h1>
                 <p class="is-default float-left ">
                  What if instead of shelling out hefty fees for a few days of legal help, you paid a monthly membership and got a law firm for life? Well, we're taking legal representation and making some revisionsin the form of accessible, affordable, full-service coverage. Finally, you can live life knowing you have a lawyer in your back pocket who, at the same time, isn't emptying it.
                 </p>
                 <div class="hero-ctas float-left">
                  <a class="btn btn-primary float-left arrow-right" href="https://checkout.legalshield.com">
                   Get Started Today
                   <span class="btn-arrow-middle">
                    <span class="arrow arrow-bar is-right">
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </a>
                  <div class="section-cta-upgrade">
                   <p class="copy-cta-upgrade">
                    Already have a plan?
                   </p>
                   <a class="cta-upgrade" href="https://checkout.legalshield.com/upgrade">
                    Upgrade your coverage!
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>

                        <p>
                         Get assistance with any legal issue involving a charge filed against an individual who has allegedly committed a criminal offense.
                        </p>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="btn btn-text learn-more-coverage">
                     <a href="https://www.legalshield.com/lawyer-directory/areas-of-law/criminal">
                      Learn More
                     </a>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <!-- Coverage details from Content type  -->
               </div>
               <div class="btn-arrows-wrapper">
                <div class="btn-arrows">
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

      <div class="paragraphs-items paragraphs-items-field-module-casestudy paragraphs-items-field-module-casestudy-full paragraphs-items-full">
       <div class="field field-name-field-module-casestudy field-type-paragraphs field-label-hidden">
        <div class="field-items">
         <div class="field-item even">
          <div class="ls-m-case-study wildsand-background">
           <div class="module-container">
            <div class="container-fluid">
             <div class="row">
              <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-5">
               <p class="subtitle">
                HOW WEVE HELPED
               </p>
               <p class="title">
                Rear End Collision. Head On Solution.
               </p>
               <p>
                Marissa was facing a potential insurance battlefor an incident that wasnt her fault.
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="col-md-6 col-md-offset-1 quote-section">
               <div class="avatar">
                <div class="field field-name-field-casestudy-profile-image field-type-image field-label-hidden">
                 <div class="field-items">
                  <div class="field-item even">
                   <img alt="" height="190" src="https://www.legalshield.com/sites/default/files/494325419-Cropped.jpg" typeof="foaf:Image" width="190"/>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
               <blockquote>
                <p class="quote">
                 A man backed into my car in a parking lotand he lied about being at fault.
                </p>
                <small class="author">
                 MARISSA
                </small>
               </blockquote>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="row steps">
              <div class="step col-xs-12 col-sm-4">
               <span class="circle">
                01
               </span>
               <p class="title">
                The Call
               </p>
               <p>
                When she faced a damaged car and a lying driver, Marissa didnt get madshe pulled out her phone. With a single tap, she was in touch with her trusted law firm.
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="step col-xs-12 col-sm-4">
               <span class="circle">
                02
               </span>
               <p class="title">
                The Letter
               </p>
               <p>
                After taking down the details, the attorney drafted a letter to the insurance companyletting them know that Marissa had the law on her side. And it came at no extra cost to Marissa.
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="step col-xs-12 col-sm-4">
               <span class="circle">
                03
               </span>
               <p class="title">
                The Result
               </p>
               <p>
                With this one-two punch, the other drivers claim collapsed. The insurance company backed down, reinvestigated, and found him at fault. And Marissa got her car fixed.
               </p>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="paragraphs-items paragraphs-items-field-module-findteam paragraphs-items-field-module-findteam-full paragraphs-items-full">
       <div class="field field-name-field-module-findteam field-type-paragraphs field-label-hidden">
        <div class="field-items">
         <div class="field-item even">
          <div class="ls-m-floating-side is-find-team">

                 <p class="eyebrow2">
                  WHERE WE ARE
                 </p>
                 <h3>
                  Were Building a Community of Coverage
                 </h3>
                 <p class="details">

                 </p>

         <div class="disclaimer-wrapper">
          <p class="disclaimer">
          </p>
          <p>
           This website gives a general overview of legal plan coverage. The benefits and prices described are not available in all states and Canadian provinces. See specific details on terms, coverage, pricing, conditions and exclusions in the Personal Legal Plans section of this website. LegalShield provides access to legal services offered by a network of provider law firms to LegalShield members and their covered family members through membership based participation. Neither LegalShield nor its officers, employees or sales associates directly or indirectly provide legal services, representation or advice. Case studies are actual LegalShield member experiences. Names and identities have been changed for attorney-client privilege requirements.
          </p>
